description.value: The creature takes a -2 status penalty to Stealth checks for 2 minutes or until it spends a 2-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove the glitter. If the creature was @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Invisible], the glitter outlines it for 1 round, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] rather than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Undetected] to visual senses.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
